Posts.Content: I finished chemo in January. My last 3 treatments was taxotere I am diabetic and am suffering terrible neuropathy in my legs and feet also swelling, my primary care Dr. said I was suffering more with this because of being diabetic and she prescribed "Lyrica" and it does help some. There are other things to help with neuropathy talk to your Dr. Good luck to you.........jp
Posts.Title: numb feet

Posts.Content: I finished chemo 1 year ago this month. I still have pain and tingling in my arms,hands,feet,and legs. All the doctors said it may subside and it may not. I am a diabetic and this added to the problem. I do believe that keeping on the move helps, but if you have to live with it at least you are alive. Good luck. Jacquie
Posts.Title: Nerve damage from Chemo
